name: Legends of Runeterra
description: Installer with winetricks "wininet" to help with the random disconnections.
notes: Be sure to log in and finish downloading the game before you stop the launcher while installing, on this installer will not find the game and will complain about something having gone wrong.

task.description: Installing the game - Follow the instructions of the installer. You will need to log in (make sure you select the right region) and download the game. Once the game is downloaded, you can close the launcher for the installer to finish.
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- launcher_exe: https://bacon.secure.dyn.riotcdn.net/channels/public/x/installer/current/live.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Riot Games/LoR/live/Game/LoR.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    app: wininet
    description: Winetricks - Installing wininet
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Installing the game - Follow the instructions of the installer. You
      will need to log in (make sure you select the right region) and download the
      game. Once the game is downloaded, you can close the launcher for the installer
      to finish.
    executable: launcher_exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  MouseWarpOverride: enable
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
